entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
